dcterms:creator: S. J. Russell
P. Norvig
dcterms:description: A grid world example where the agent tries to reach a goal while avoiding obstacles, specifically lava. The environment is modeled as a Markov Decision Process.
dcterms:title: Russell/Norvig grid

dcterms:creator: S. Koenig
R. G. Simmons
dcterms:description: A 60-state Markov Decision Process where the agent must navigate from the leftmost state to the goal state on the right, with deterministic transitions.
dcterms:title: 60-state chain MDP

dcterms:description: A collection of approximately 10,000,000 randomly generated reward functions for states in a reinforcement learning environment.
dcterms:title: Random reward functions (approx. 10,000,000 generated)

dcterms:description: Conceptual design of subgoal states placed along a 60-state chain to facilitate learning in reinforcement learning tasks.
dcterms:title: Subgoal states in a 60-state chain
